name: Mậu Binh
description:
Mau Binh card game is the fascinating, amusing effective game for everyone. If you're in the mood to play but alone or missing friends, this game is the best fit for you. You just turn on the device, enter the game, the virtual opponents with perfect playing skills are awaiting you. We, the studio had success with the famous classic games such as Gold Miner, Lines 98, Shoot eggs guarantee the quality of this game.

The salient features of the game:
- No need internet connection
- All free
- Beautiful interface and easy to use
- Graphical effects, vivid sound
- Supports select all reviews
- Smart programmed opponents

Contact:
- Visit our official site at http://www.senspark.com
- Send your feedback via feedback@senspark.com
